Welcome to the Summer Olympics Dashboard, this project used the Olympics dataset from the RGriffin Kaggle dataset (1896-2016) featured in TidyTuesday Week 32 of 2024, this project visualizes medal counts, athlete performance, and demographic trends. Built with R, it highlights increasing gender parity, top athlete achievements, and the growing impact of women on the US Gold medal count. You can find the project [here](https://gbotosh.github.io/tidy_tuesday/){target="_blank"}. The code for the project can be found in this [GitHub repository](https://github.com/gbotosh/tidy_tuesday){target="_blank"}
